Content:: Maheepala Herath is a Sri Lankan politician. The current Governor of the North Central Province, he was the former Chief Minister of Sabaragamuwa Province of Sri Lanka. He belongs to the Sri Lanka Freedom Party and part of the United People's Freedom Alliance.[1][2][3][4][5]  This article about a politician from North Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a politician from Sabaragamuwa Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Maheepala Herath - Wikipedia
